string.name: standard
string.comment: As in standard chess (not a variant)

string.name: standardTitle
string.comment: Description for standard chess (it has to have a description, just like all variants of the game).

string.name: chess960
string.comment:
A chess variant where the setup of the back rank is randomised into up to 960 positions. Also known as Fischerandom and freestyle chess.
Consider checking for already accepted names for this variant in your language through Wikidata: https://w.wiki/FkdK

string.name: chess960Title
string.comment:
Description for the Chess960 variant.
The "home rank" here is the back rank of each side (1 for white and 8 for blank) - which has the rooks, knights, bishops, king and queen.

string.name: kingOfTheHill
string.comment:
The name of a chess variant which follows standard rule, with the additional option that you can bring your king to the centre to win the game.
The four centre tiles (e4, d4, e5, d5) appear to be visually elevated, like a hill.

string.name: kingOfTheHillTitle
string.comment: Description for the King of the Hill chess variant

resources.string: Før kongen til midten for å vinne.

string.name: threeCheck
string.comment: The name of a chess variant. The rules are the same as standard chess, with one addition: you may also win by checking the opponent's king three times.

string.name: threeCheckTitle
string.comment: Description for the Three-Check Chess variant

resources.string: Sett motstanderen i sjakk tre ganger for å vinne.

string.name: antichess
string.comment: The name of a chess variant where you must lose your pieces or get stalemated to win. Basically, the opposite of chess (hence being "anti" chess).

resources.string: Få alle brikkene dine slått (eller bli satt patt) for å vinne.

string.name: atomic
string.comment: The name of a chess variant where pieces explode when captured. Named after nuclear explosions.

string.name: atomicTitle
string.comment: Description for the Atomic Chess variant. Alternatives to nuke could be "blow up" or "explode".

resources.string: Spreng motstanderens konge for å vinne.

string.name: horde
string.comment: The name of a chess variant where one side has a regular chess army but the other has dozens of pawns, resembling a horde.

string.name: hordeTitle
string.comment: Description for the Horde chess variant

resources.string: Den ene siden har mange bønder, den andre en vanlig hær.

string.name: racingKings
string.comment:
The name of a chess variant where both sides start on the same rank, and need to reach the other side of the board win.
No need to translate literally. Focus on making it fun, capturing the spirit of the variant.

string.name: racingKingsTitle
string.comment: Description for the Racing Kings chess variant

resources.string: Før kongen over brettet for å vinne.

string.name: crazyhouse
string.comment: The name of a chess variant where pieces you capture can be put on the board (similar to shogi).

string.name: crazyhouseTitle
string.comment: Description for the Crazyhouse chess variant

resources.string: Slåtte brikker kan droppes tilbake på brettet i stedet for å flytte en brikke.
